ygData.subject: Re: FEIGN DEATH FAILURE!!!!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I went to Permafrost last night and used it about 4 times.  Once when I was solo and got attacked by several of the goblins at the entrance, once when some
ygData.messageBody:
> Let me know if you all have noticed any difference. If ya haven't, I may be having a string of bad luck. If ya have, it might mean the demise of more monks out there.

I went to Permafrost last night and used it about 4 times. Once when I was solo
and got attacked by several of the goblins at the entrance, once when some high
level characters brought a bunch of elites to the zone, once when an ice giant
decided to say hello, and once when I was afk. ;) It worked every time for me.

One night in Mistmoore, before the patch, it failed on me ("Faeaani has fallen
to the ground") three times in a row while I was trying to get away from a train
of ancilles and gypsies, but that's been the extent of my bad luck with FD.

Faeaani Saillune
Level 22
Innoruuk
